verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Having Called To Him <S%G4341><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His <S%G846><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Over Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> So As <S%G5620><s%> To Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Heal <S%G2323><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Disease <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Bodily Weakness. <S%G3119><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now Of The <S%G1161><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Names <S%G3686><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> These : <S%G5023><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G3004><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His; <S%G846><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His; <S%G846><s%>

Philip, <S%G5376><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bartholomew; <S%G918><s%> Thomas, <S%G2381><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Matthew <S%G3156><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherer; <S%G5057><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Alphaeus, <S%G256><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lebbaeus <S%G3002><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Thaddaeus; <S%G2280><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Canaanite, <S%G2581><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

These <S%G5128><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Sent Forth <S%G649><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Having Charged <S%G3853><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> <S%G1484><s%> Of The Gentiles <S%G3361><s%> Go Not Off, <S%G565><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G4541><s%> Of The Samaritans <S%G3361><s%> Enter Not; <S%G1525><s%>
<S%G4198><s%> But Go <S%G1161><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lost <S%G622><s%> Of The House <S%G3624><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Going <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Proclaim, <S%G2784><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> Has Drawn Near <S%G1448><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

Sick <S%G770><s%> Heal, <S%G2323><s%> Lepers <S%G3015><s%> Cleanse, <S%G2511><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Raise, <S%G1453><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> Cast Out : <S%G1544><s%> Gratuitously <S%G1432><s%> Ye Received, <S%G2983><s%> Gratuitously <S%G1432><s%> Impart. <S%G1325><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Provide Not <S%G2932><s%> Gold, <S%G5557><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Silver, <S%G696><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Money <S%G5475><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2223><s%> Your Belts, <S%G5216><s%>

Nor <S%G3361><s%> Provision Bag <S%G4082><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The Way, <S%G3598><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Tunics, <S%G5509><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Sandals, <S%G5266><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> A Staff : <S%G4464><s%> <S%G514><s%> For Worthy <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Workman <S%G2040><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5160><s%> Of His Food <S%G846><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> And Into Whatever <S%G302><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Village <S%G2968><s%> Ye Enter, <S%G1525><s%> Inquire <S%G1833><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And There <S%G2546><s%> Remain <S%G3306><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> Ye Go Forth. <S%G1831><s%>
<S%G1525><s%> But Entering <S%G1161><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> It : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Be <S%G5600><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Worthy, <S%G514><s%> Let Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1515><s%> Your Peace <S%G5216><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> <S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3361><s%> It Be Not <S%G5600><s%> Worthy, <S%G514><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1515><s%> Your Peace <S%G5216><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Let Return. <S%G1994><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Whoever <S%G3361><s%> Will Not Receive <S%G1209><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Will Hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Your Words, <S%G5216><s%> Going Forth <S%G1831><s%> Of That <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> That, <S%G1565><s%> Shake Off <S%G1621><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dust <S%G2868><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> Of Your Feet. <S%G5216><s%>

Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> More Tolerable <S%G414><s%> It Shall Be For The <S%G2071><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrah <S%G1116><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Judgment, <S%G2920><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> For That City. <S%G1565><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Send Forth 649 V-PAI-1S You 5209 P-2AP As 5613 ADV Sheep 4263 N-NPN In 1722 PREP The Midst 3319 A-DSN Of Wolves : 3074 N-GPM Be Ye 1096 V-PNM-2P Therefore 3767 CONJ Prudent 5429 A-NPM As 5613 ADV The 3588 T-NPM Serpents, 3789 N-NPM And 2532 CONJ Harmless 185 A-NPM As 5613 ADV The 3588 T-NPF Doves. 4058 N-NPF

<S%G4337><s%> But Beware <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men; <S%G444><s%> <S%G3860><s%> For They Will Deliver <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Sanhedrims, <S%G4892><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Their Synagogues <S%G846><s%> They Will Scourge <S%G3146><s%> You : <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> Governors <S%G2232><s%> Also <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Ye Shall Be Brought <S%G71><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> Me, <S%G1700><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Nations. <S%G1484><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> They Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5209><s%> You, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Careful <S%G3309><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Speak : <S%G2980><s%> <S%G1325><s%> For It Shall Be Given <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Shall Speak : <S%G2980><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Speak, <S%G2980><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of Your Father <S%G5216><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G3860><s%> But Will Deliver Up <S%G1161><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Death; <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Child : <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Rise Up <S%G1881><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> Parents, <S%G1118><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Put To Death <S%G2289><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Hated <S%G3404><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name; <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Endures <S%G5278><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The End, <S%G5056><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Shall Be Saved. <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> They Persecute <S%G1377><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4172><s%> This City, <S%G3778><s%> Flee <S%G5343><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Another : <S%G243><s%> <S%G281><s%> For Verily <S%G1063><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Will Ye Have Completed <S%G5055><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> Be Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man. <S%G444><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> A Disciple <S%G3101><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> A Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord. <S%G846><s%>

Sufficient <S%G713><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Disciple <S%G3101><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Become <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1320><s%> His Teacher, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondman <S%G1401><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> His Lord. <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Master Of The House <S%G3617><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%>, They Called, <S%G2564><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3615><s%> Of His Household? <S%G846><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Ye Should Fear <S%G5399><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3762><s%> For Nothing <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Covered <S%G2572><s%> With <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Uncovered, <S%G601><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hidden <S%G2927><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Known. <S%G1097><s%>

What <S%G3739><s%> I Tell <S%G3004><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Speak <S%G2036><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light; <S%G5457><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ear <S%G3775><s%> Ye Hear <S%G191><s%> Proclaim <S%G2784><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Housetops. <S%G1430><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Ye Should Not Fear <S%G5399><s%> Because Of <S%G575><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Kill <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Soul <S%G3361><s%> Are Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Kill; <S%G615><s%> <S%G5399><s%> But Ye Should Fear <S%G1161><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> To Destroy <S%G622><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Gehenna. <S%G1067><s%>

Not <S%G3780><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Sparrows <S%G4765><s%> For An Assarion <S%G787><s%> Are Sold? <S%G4453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Fall <S%G4098><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> Without <S%G427><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father. <S%G5216><s%>
<S%G5216><s%> But Of You <S%G1161><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hairs <S%G2359><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Numbered <S%G705><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>
Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%>, Ye Should Fear; <S%G5399><s%> Than Many <S%G4183><s%> Sparrows <S%G4765><s%> Better Are <S%G1308><s%> Ye. <S%G5210><s%>

Every One <S%G3956><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3670><s%> Shall Confess <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Will Confess <S%G3670><s%> <S%G2504><s%> Also I 1722 PREP Him 846 P-DSM Before 1715 PREP 3588 T-GSM 3962 N-GSM My Father 3450 P-1GS Who Is 3588 T-GSM In The 1722 PREP Heavens. 3772 N-DPM

<S%G3748><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whosoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Deny <S%G720><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Will Deny <S%G720><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Also I 2504 P-1NS-C Before 1715 PREP 3588 T-GSM 3962 N-GSM My Father 3450 P-1GS Who Is 3588 T-GSM In 1722 PREP The Heavens. 3772 N-DPM

<S%G3361><s%> Think Not <S%G3543><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Came <S%G2064><s%> To Place <S%G906><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth : <S%G1093><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Came Not <S%G2064><s%> To Place <S%G906><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A Sword. <S%G3162><s%>

I Came <S%G2064><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To Set At Variance <S%G1369><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> Her Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Daughter - In - Law <S%G3565><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother - In - Law <S%G3994><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Enemies <S%G2190><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of The Man Shall Be <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Household <S%G3615><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G5368><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Worthy; <S%G514><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G5368><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Daughter <S%G2364><s%> Above <S%G5228><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Worthy. <S%G514><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Takes Not <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4716><s%> His Cross <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Follows <S%G190><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Me <S%G3450><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of Me <S%G3450><s%> Worthy. <S%G514><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Has Found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> Shall Lose <S%G622><s%>, It; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has Lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> His <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1752><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Shall Find <S%G2147><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>
